thread.title: Nandita Swetha remembers her time with Vijay, Sudeep
thread.title_full: Nandita Swetha remembers her time with Vijay, Sudeep - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Nandita Swetha remembers her time with Vijay, Sudeep
text:
Nandita Swetha turned a year older on April 30, but this year, her birthday was an even more special affair. The reason: it was spent with stars like Vijay and Sudeep.
Nandita was part of the star cast of the Tamil movie Puli, which also stars Vijay, Sudeep, Sridevi , Hansika Motwani and Shruti Haasan. The pretty Nandita brought in her birthday on the set of the movie, and the crew arranged for a cake to be bought and cut there. She uploaded the following picture on her social media page, along wit the caption, "How can I forget this day-) #Puli @actorvijay @KicchaSudeep @chimbu_deven @natty_nataraj @dhilipaction @SKTStudios":
